item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 8, 2024 at 11:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Don't defer Close() on writable files (47 points | 35 comments)
2. An open discussion forum for ArXiv papers (90 points | 36 comments)
3. Malaysia backtracks on DNS redirection decision (45 points | 30 comments)
4. Why OpenStack and Kata Containers are both seeing a resurgence of adoption (57 points | 26 comments)
5. Baiting the bot (65 points | 30 comments)
6. Asking the Wrong Questions (2017) (125 points | 60 comments)
7. WebP: The WebPage Compression Format (402 points | 145 comments)
8. FutureRack: Server racks are everywhere. Now you can find them in your home (77 points | 38 comments)
9. Minimal Web (65 points | 40 comments)
10. Cracking an old ZIP file to help open source the ANC's "Vula" secret crypto code (206 points | 20 comments)
11. Gnome Files: A detailed UI examination (229 points | 132 comments)
12. Microui+fenster=Small GUI (85 points | 11 comments)
13. Pick Your Distributed Poison (93 points | 20 comments)
14. Cruise ships chopped in half are a license to print money (52 points | 16 comments)
15. A new rare high-rank elliptic curve, and an orchard of Diophantine equations (172 points | 11 comments)
16. Keyhole – Forge own Windows Store licenses (540 points | 253 comments)
17. CitizenDJ – Make music using free audio and video from the Library of Congress (140 points | 7 comments)
18. Dogs can remember names of toys years after not seeing them, study shows (241 points | 123 comments)
19. PC Floppy Copy Protection: Softguard Superlok (4 points | discuss)
20. Appalachian Trail Hiker Photo Archive (93 points | 19 comments)
21. Early science and stone engineering in Menga, a Neolithic dolmen (11 points | discuss)
22. The "email is authentication" pattern (203 points | 297 comments)
23. Battlestar Galactica: Technical Manual (2005) (31 points | 7 comments)
24. The worsening Raspberry Pi RP2350 E9 erratum situation (20 points | 4 comments)
25. GPT-fabricated scientific papers on Google Scholar (144 points | 84 comments)
26. The little-known life of the scarfing tool (5 points | discuss)
27. How a 16th Century Explorer's Sailing Ship Works (8 points | discuss)
28. Things to know about the Great Wave (223 points | 69 comments)
29. WordPerfect for Unix Character Terminals (18 points | 10 comments)
30. Beyond Ctrl-C: The dark corners of Unix signal handling (91 points | 37 comments)
